mapper.select: select m.board_no , m.board_writer as board_writer , m.exercise as exercise , m.startdate as startdate , m.enddate as enddate , (DATE_SUB(m.startdate,interval 1 hour)) as deadline , m.region as region , m.region2 as region2 , m.recruitsNum as recruitsNum , m.title as title , m.content as content , m.b_category as b_category , m.finished as finished , m.regdate as regdate , m.clicks as clicks , m.sportsfacility as sportsfacility , m.supporttype as supporttype , m.facilityadd as facilityadd , (select case when w.board_no is null then false else true end) as is_wish from matchboard m left join wishlist w on m.board_no = w.board_no and m.finished = 0 group by m.board_no order by deadline desc limit 6
